properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 10:47PM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...HEAVY SNOW FRIDAY...

.A potent winter storm will move into the Inland Northwest
Friday. Light snow will begin in the morning hours on Friday with
snow intensity increasing Friday afternoon and night.  Snow showers
will linger through Saturday.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2
inches around Ritzville and 3 to 5 inches along Highway 2
between Grand Coulee and Creston.

* WHERE...Grand Coulee, Odessa, Wilbur, and Coulee City.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to 10 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest accumulating snow will occur
along the highway 2 corridor and along Interstate 90 east of
Sprague.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY
